channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: You Can Get Paid to Talk to Friends About Voting
item.description: Annoying texts and disinformation campaigns have wrecked get-out-the-vote drives. Relentless, a progressive organizing group, thinks it has a solution...

item.title: How Clean Energy Ventures avoided the pandemic bubble and raised a $305M fund
item.description: When other firms were investing and raising eye-popping sums, Clean Energy Ventures took a different approach. It appears to be paying off. © 2024 Tec...

item.title: Phil Wizard, Champion Breaker and Olympic Contender, Isn’t Convinced ‘Breakdancing’ Is a Sport
item.description: Phil Wizard, the current favorite for Olympic Gold, says it’s an art and culture first. But if you’re gonna hate, he’d like you to at least learn the ...

item.title: OpenAI signs 100K PwC workers to ChatGPT’s enterprise tier as PwC becomes its first resale partner
item.description: PwC, the management consulting giant, will become OpenAI’s biggest customer to date, covering 100,000 users. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. F...

item.title: 'Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door' Sets the Standard for Classic Game Remakes
item.description: Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door proves that using new tech to bring old visions to life (and cut down on pain points) is way more effective than a...

item.title: 72 hours left of the Disrupt early-bird sale
item.description: Tech enthusiasts and entrepreneurs, the clock is ticking! With just 72 hours remaining until the early-bird ticket deadline for TechCrunch Disrupt 202...

item.title: The 27 Best Shows on Apple TV+ Right Now (June 2024)
item.description: Constellation, For All Mankind, and a Steve Martin documentary are among the best shows on Apple TV+ this month.

item.title: Avendus, India’s top venture advisor, confirms it’s looking to raise a $350 million fund

item.title: Chromebooks Will Get Gemini and New Google AI Features
item.description: Google is bringing Gemini and a slew of AI-powered features to ChromeOS, and there are about seven new Chromebooks coming this year.

item.title: China’s $47B semiconductor fund puts chip sovereignty front and center
